item.title: A Long Bird Stops The Drafts (Draughts)
item.description: Our front door has a weird doorstop and a huge gap below the door, so I designed a weirdo bird to fit under it. I originally wanted it to be a bittern and was planning on painting it, but I couldnâ€™t bring myself to change it from egret form. Then, after I made it, I used a thermal camera to have a look and see if it made a difference.
